meanings.sent1: Her discernment in choosing the right path was admirable.
meanings.sent2: His discernment in selecting the best candidate for the job was evident.
meanings.sent3: With his discernment, he could always tell which cookie had the most chocolate chips.
meanings.sent4: The detective's discernment in solving cases was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's discernment in understanding her students' needs made her a favorite among them.

meanings.definition: Perception in the absence of judgment with a view to obtaining spiritual direction and understanding
meanings.sent1: Through discernment, she sought guidance from a higher power.
meanings.sent2: The monks practiced discernment to gain spiritual insights.
meanings.sent3: His discernment led him to believe in the power of positive thinking.
meanings.sent4: The artist's discernment allowed him to see beauty in the simplest of things.
meanings.sent5: The old man's discernment in meditation brought him peace and clarity.
